MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD8 postcode area of Jedburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4.30pm to repair broken equipment, on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.34pm on Friday 27th November 2020.
